QuestData.Title: The Ebon Hunter
QuestData.Description: The laser should be good to go once we get it set up, there's just one more thing I need.$B$BThere's a spore walker that hunts on the delta just southeast from here. It has an apparatus on its face that can fire a powerful laser - way more powerful than what we have hooked up.$B$BI want it.$B$BWe'll be mining faster than you can imagine once we get that bad boy hooked up!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect an Organic Laser Apparatus from the Ebon Hunter.
QuestData.RewardText: Perfection. Let's get it hooked up!
